bill.title: Corrections; various provisions modified relating to e-filing of disposition of detainers, language access to limited English proficient individuals, statutory language regarding substance use disorder assessment process, facility for commitment of adjudicated delinquents based on rehabilitation needs, issuing warrant for convicted defendant not reporting to facility postsentencing, release of incarcerated persons, employment benefit participation, readmission to challenge incarceration program, Shakopee correctional facility offers challenge incarceration program, Advisory Council of Interstate Supervision and Interstate Commission for Juveniles, intensive community supervision program law, and mechanism for funding probation services resulting from transition of services to Department of Corrections.
bill.description: Corrections; various provisions modified relating to e-filing of disposition of detainers, language access to limited English proficient individuals, statutory language regarding substance use disorder assessment process, facility for commitment of adjudicated delinquents based on rehabilitation needs, issuing warrant for convicted defendant not reporting to facility postsentencing, release of incarcerated persons, employment benefit participation, readmission to challenge incarceration program, Shakopee correctional facility offers challenge incarceration program, Advisory Council of Interstate Supervision and Interstate Commission for Juveniles, intensive community supervision program law, and mechanism for funding probation services resulting from transition of services to Department of Corrections.

history.action: Introduction and first reading, referred to Public Safety Finance and Policy
Committee report, to adopt as amended
